info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 13 at 4:35PM PDT until September 13 at 7:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... North Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 745 PM PDT. * At 435 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Highway 93 from the the intersection with Sr 168 south to Mile Marker 58, Coyote Springs and Sr 168 from the 93 east to Mile Marker 16. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
